data.message:
Marshall, i know you have great ecconomy
and i know that you have songs and big delivery

But take the right Choice and help People around the country
cuz wrong People use their Money for them selfs to smoke weed
you can't Call it real.

replies.message:
Cuz i know that poor People need some help
and you gotta know that the right Choice is to wish them well
cuz With no good People the world would be a livin hell
so understand this that i wish you well
so make the right Choice today
